import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ReportButton(){const[key,setKey]=useState([]);const[value,setValue]=useState([]);const[minPrice,setMinPrice]=useState("");const[maxPrice,setMaxPrice]=useState("");const[filteredValue,setFilteredValue]=useState([]);const fetchData=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get("http://localhost:3000/report-page");setKey(Object.keys(response.data[0]));//FOR COLON
const valueArray=[];//TODO OK VALULERİ EKLYOR ARRAY'E
for(let i=0;i<Object.values(response.data).length;i++){valueArray.push(Object.values(response.data[i]));}setValue(valueArray);//FOR ROW
setFilteredValue(valueArray);// Initialize filtered value with all data
}catch(error){console.error("Error fetching data",error);}};useEffect(()=>{filterDataByPrice();},[minPrice,maxPrice,value]);const filterDataByPrice=()=>{if(!minPrice&&!maxPrice){setFilteredValue(value);return;}const filteredData=value.filter(row=>{const price=parseFloat(row[key.indexOf("price")]);// Assuming "price" is one of the keys
if(isNaN(price))return false;if(minPrice&&maxPrice){return price>=parseFloat(minPrice)&&price<=parseFloat(maxPrice);}else if(minPrice){return price>=parseFloat(minPrice);}else{return price<=parseFloat(maxPrice);}});setFilteredValue(filteredData);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:fetchData,className:"bg-blue-500 hover:bg-blue-700 text-white font-bold py-2 px-4 rounded mr-2",children:"Veriyi Getir"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:minPrice,onChange:e=>setMinPrice(e.target.value),placeholder:"Min Fiyat",className:"border-2 border-gray-300 p-2 mr-2"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:maxPrice,onChange:e=>setMaxPrice(e.target.value),placeholder:"Max Fiyat",className:"border-2 border-gray-300 p-2 mr-2"})]}),key.length>0&&filteredValue.length>0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{className:"table-auto mt-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tr",{children:key.map((item,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{className:"px-4 py-2 bg-gray-200 text-gray-800",children:item},index))})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:filteredValue.map((innerArray,outerIndex)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tr",{children:innerArray.map((item,innerIndex)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"border px-4 py-2",children:item},innerIndex))},outerIndex))})]})]});}export default ReportButton;// TODO USE EFFECT VE AXİOS İLE BİLGİLERİ GETİR ORADAN DA ONLARI GRİDLE TABLO ŞEKLİNDE BUTONU CLİCKLEDİĞİNDE
//TODO burada useState ile  aldığımız verileri  use effect içerisinde deStructere edelim key ve valuediye
